subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: It can get pretty strange.
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1208901576
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Frank,
 
I know this is all stupid and some of us have really had enough of  it.  
Especially being called childish names and being swore at and  threatened.  But it 
hasn't stopped in private emails?
 
This is such the case.  And now it has come down to physical threats  because 
well maybe that's all these neanderthals know or can understand.   ANd yes it 
has been reported to the proper authorities but what do you recommend  be 
done about iy.
 
Your opinion would be greatly appreiated.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/22/2008 4:56:05 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
Huh!? I can only say, I don't have to do this group thing either, I  
stay cuz a few request it. The guys actually talk more if I don't  
share. 

I can understand where Bruce was coming fom, to a point,  but when 
you start making threatening private e-mails to make sure  everyone 
agrees with you, that's just demented and wrong. This shit ain't  
that important!

FS

--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
psfponies <psfponies@.ps> wrote:
>
> Interesting  message Frank considering the events that have 
unfolded over the last  couple of days. Kind of like shooting oneself 
in the foot!
>  
> Kay
> 
> 
> Frank Sumption  <purplealiengirl@pur> wrote:
> .hmmessage P { margin:0px;  padding:0px } 
body.hmmessage { FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY:body.hmmessage { F
four archangels represent different fields of modern science.  
Gabriel is the patron of computers and the Internet." From  
www.pyracantha.www.pyracanthawww.
> 
> Also "  
> The Archangel Gabriel Archangel of the West and of Water, Gabriel  
is the Messenger of God. And is well known for his announcement of 
the  birth of Jesus.
> He is connected with our emotions, cleansing, loving  and intuitive 
self. And can aid you with your spiritual insight, growth  and 
travels on the astral planes.
> Also connected with the Moon,  and the sea and all life that is 
within.If you are working with dolphins,  he is your contact.
> Present at our births he occasionally turns up at  our final 
transition to ease us through. "
> 
> From  sanctuary-of- From  sanc From  sanc Fro
> 
>  
> 
> A weird Gabriel reference, and a Bruce comment. From a  recording 
done Sunday night. 
> 
> Frank-S
>
